attributes.action:
Put parliament to the electorate.  
Allow the public to have an election . Now
attributes.additional_details:
The public must be allowed to vote in a general election to prevent the shambles currently embarrassing this nation.
The referendum whether you agree or not with the result was definitive.   All parties agreed to the wording of it and to honour the result.    .
We have a parliament that is crippled with self serving ministers grandstanding for press coverage .
Mps fail to represent the will off their constituents .  
An election will rid us of the dead wood and get this country moving again
attributes.background:
MPs continually frustrate parliament and the will of the public regarding Brexit. 
We currently have a minority government , hamstrung by the opposition and some of its own members .
